event.descr:
This trap indicates that the firewall have detected a attack. The bound objects provide more detailed information about this problem.

swTrapInfoTrapDescription%parm[#2]%
event.logmsg: SonicWall Event: Firewall Has Detected an Attack.

event.descr:
This trap indicates that there is a system problem with the SonicWALL appliance. The bound objects provide more detailed information about this problem.

swTrapInfoTrapDescription%parm[#2]%
event.logmsg: SonicWall Event: System Problem with SonicWALL Appliance.

event.descr:
This trap indicates that there is a web site was blocked by the firewall. The bound objects provide more detailed information about this problem.

swTrapInfoTrapDescription%parm[#2]%
This is the default event format used when an enterprise specific event (trap) is received from a SonicWall device for which no format has been configured (i.e. no event definition exists).
event.logmsg: Received unformatted enterprise event (enterprise:%id% generic:%generic% specific:%specific%). %parm[##]% args: %parm[all]%
